Operation 'GetPrometheusMetrics' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is insufficient - it merely references external documentation without explaining what the operation does or what an AI agent should expect. The summary is generic and doesn't specify the API context. Improved version clarifies that this retrieves metrics from 1Password Connect specifically, explains the response format, notes authentication requirements, and provides context about use cases. This helps AI agents understand when to call this operation and how to interpret results.

data.current_summary: Query server for exposed Prometheus metrics
data.current_description: See Prometheus documentation for a complete data model.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve Prometheus metrics from 1Password Connect server
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves Prometheus-formatted metrics from the 1Password Connect server. Returns metrics in Prometheus text exposition format including server health, API request statistics, and operational performance data. No authentication required. Useful for monitoring and observability integration with Prometheus or compatible monitoring systems.
data.reasoning: Original description is insufficient - it merely references external documentation without explaining what the operation does or what an AI agent should expect. The summary is generic and doesn't specify the API context. Improved version clarifies that this retrieves metrics from 1Password Connect specifically, explains the response format, notes authentication requirements, and provides context about use cases. This helps AI agents understand when to call this operation and how to interpret results.

message: Operation 'GetApiActivity' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is clear and actionable. Description is missing entirely. Added details about return type (APIRequest objects), pagination support, and what information is included in responses to help AI agents understand the operation's output and available filtering options.

data.current_summary: Retrieve a list of API Requests that have been made.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of API requests made to the 1Password Connect API. Returns APIRequest objects containing details about each request including the token used, resource accessed, timestamp, and request status. Supports filtering and pagination parameters to narrow results.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description is missing entirely. Added details about return type (APIRequest objects), pagination support, and what information is included in responses to help AI agents understand the operation's output and available filtering options.

message: Operation 'GetVaults' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description is missing. Added description explaining return type (Vault objects), what metadata is included, and that filtering is available for better AI agent decision-making.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of all Vaults accessible to the authenticated token. Returns an array of Vault objects containing vault metadata including UUID, name, content type, and item counts. Supports optional filtering via query parameters.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description is missing. Improved summary to specify '1Password Vaults' for domain clarity. Added description explaining return type (Vault objects), what metadata is included, and that filtering is available for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_summary: Get all items for inside a Vault
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve all Items from a specific Vault
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all Items stored within a specific Vault identified by vaultUuid. Returns an array of Item objects containing item metadata including UUID, title, category, tags, and timestamps. Supports pagination and filtering parameters to control result set.
data.reasoning: Summary has grammatical issue ('for inside'). Description is missing. Improved summary for clarity and grammar. Added description explaining the vaultUuid requirement, return type (Item objects), available metadata fields, and pagination/filtering support for AI agent usability.

message: Operation 'CreateVaultItem' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear and actionable. Description is missing. Added details about the FullItem request schema, return value (created Item with UUID), and side effect (item is stored and accessible) to help AI agents understand inputs, outputs, and state changes.

data.description_suggestion: Creates a new Item within the specified Vault. Accepts a FullItem object in the request body containing item details, fields, and metadata. Returns the created Item object with assigned UUID and timestamps. The new Item is immediately stored in the Vault and accessible to authorized users.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description is missing. Added details about the FullItem request schema, return value (created Item with UUID), and side effect (item is stored and accessible) to help AI agents understand inputs, outputs, and state changes.

data.current_summary: Get the details of an Item
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information about a specific Item by its UUID within a Vault. Returns a FullItem object containing complete item data including all fields, metadata, attachments, and custom properties. Requires both vaultUuid and itemUuid path parameters.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description is missing. Added details about the FullItem return type, what comprehensive data is included, and the required path parameters (vaultUuid and itemUuid) for AI agent clarity.

message: Operation 'UpdateVaultItem' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear and actionable. Description is missing. Added details about the FullItem request schema, full replacement behavior (not partial), return value, required path parameters, and side effect (timestamps updated) to help AI agents understand the update semantics and implications.

data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing Item within a Vault using a full replacement strategy. Accepts a FullItem object in the request body with updated item data. Returns the updated Item object with modified timestamps. Requires both vaultUuid and itemUuid path parameters. The entire Item is replaced with provided data.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable. Description is missing. Added details about the FullItem request schema, full replacement behavior (not partial), return value, required path parameters, and side effect (timestamps updated) to help AI agents understand the update semantics and implications.

message: Operation 'DeleteVaultItem' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_side_effects. Missing description entirely. Added context about permanence, required parameters, side effects (removal of associated data), and expected response to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes an Item from the specified Vault. Requires the Vault UUID and Item UUID. This operation cannot be undone and will remove all associated data including fields and files. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Missing description entirely. Added context about permanence, required parameters, side effects (removal of associated data), and expected response to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation.

message: Operation 'GetItemFiles' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Missing description. data.current_summary: Get all the files inside an Item
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all File objects associated with a specific Item in a Vault. Requires the Vault UUID and Item UUID. Returns an array of File objects containing metadata such as file name, size, and ID. Use this to enumerate files before downloading or managing individual files.
data.reasoning: Missing description. Added context about what is returned (array of File objects), what metadata is included, and use cases to help AI agents understand the operation's purpose and output structure.

message: Operation 'GetDetailsOfFileById' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Missing description. data.current_summary: Get the details of a File
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed metadata for a specific File within an Item. Requires the Vault UUID, Item UUID, and File UUID. Returns a File object containing properties such as name, size, content type, and creation timestamp. Use this to inspect file properties before downloading or performing other file operations.
data.reasoning: Missing description. Added context about required parameters, what metadata is returned, and typical use cases to help AI agents understand when to use this operation versus downloading file content.

message: Operation 'DownloadFileByID' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing description and vague summary. Improved summary to be more action-oriented. Added context about binary content, Content-Type header, streaming behavior, and use cases to help AI agents understand this is a download operation distinct from metadata retrieval.

data.current_summary: Get the content of a File
data.description_suggestion: Downloads the binary content of a specific File from an Item in a Vault. Requires the Vault UUID, Item UUID, and File UUID. Returns the raw file content with appropriate Content-Type header. This endpoint streams the file data and is used to retrieve the actual file contents for local storage or processing.
data.reasoning: Missing description and vague summary. Improved summary to be more action-oriented. Added context about binary content, Content-Type header, streaming behavior, and use cases to help AI agents understand this is a download operation distinct from metadata retrieval.

message: Operation 'GetHeartbeat' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing description. Improved summary for clarity. Added context about authentication requirements (none), expected response, and use cases for monitoring and connection validation to help AI agents understand this is a simple availability check.

data.description_suggestion: Performs a lightweight health check to verify the 1Password Connect server is running and responsive. Requires no authentication. Returns a 200 OK response if the server is alive. Use this endpoint for monitoring server availability and connection validation.
data.reasoning: Missing description. Improved summary for clarity. Added context about authentication requirements (none), expected response, and use cases for monitoring and connection validation to help AI agents understand this is a simple availability check.

message: Operation 'GetServerHealth' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Missing description. Added context about what is returned (health report with ServiceDependency objects), the distinction from heartbeat (includes dependencies), and use cases to help AI agents understand this provides more detailed health information than the heartbeat endpoint.

data.current_summary: Get state of the server and its dependencies.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves comprehensive health status of the 1Password Connect server and all registered service dependencies. Returns a health report including the server state and individual ServiceDependency objects indicating the status of each dependency. Use this for detailed health monitoring and dependency validation.
data.reasoning: Missing description. Added context about what is returned (health report with ServiceDependency objects), the distinction from heartbeat (includes dependencies), and use cases to help AI agents understand this provides more detailed health information than the heartbeat endpoint.
